the user logs in
the user selects the Anime crate
the user selects a twelve month subscription plan

elements.name: International user signs up for random month Anime subscription

steps.name: a registered user with a Austria address
the user logs in
the user selects the Anime crate
the user sets their country to Austria
the user selects a random month subscription plan

the new subscription should be added to the user account
recurly should have a matching international subscription
the recurly billing address should have no state
the user should receive a anime confirmation email

the user account should reflect the cancellation
the recurly subscription should be expired

result.error_message:
expected to find text "Thank you for signing up to receive Epic Sales, Looter Intel and our" in "How it Works Pick a Crate Past Crates Earn $5 Log In Order by the 19th at 9pm PT to receive March's crate. Offer ends soon! MONTHLY CRATE OF VIDEO GAME COLLECTIBLES & GEAR Our newest monthly mystery crate filled with figures, apparel, collectibles and more from your favorite gaming universes. GET LOOT GAMING LEARN MORE MONTHLY MYSTERY GEEK + GAMER GEAR A monthly mystery crate filled with exclusive items from the biggest and best pop culture franchises. GET LOOT CRATE LEARN MORE AWESOME GEAR MONTHLY Get exclusive products from top gaming & entertainment franchises Each month’s theme features a mix of the best in pop culture Cool limited edition stuff like shirts, vinyl figures, and other collectibles GREAT VALUE 4-6 items over $45 of retail value in every crate Be the first to get access to specialty crates like Fallout 4 and Mass Effect Discounts on longer subscriptions and a bonus gift for 12 month plan DELIVERED TO YOUR DOOR Treat yourself to a geeky gift every month Your crate will arrive between the 20th to the 25th of each month No commitment, you’re in control We partner with top brands to get exclusive products What Looters Say I won't open my crate unless I have time to enjoy and dig in Lynn EXCLUSIVE ITEMS IN EVERY CRATE! GIFT YOURSELF Let us find the best loot for you MONTHLY SURPRISE We’re your geeky Santa Claus EXCLUSIVE LOOT You can’t get this anywhere else CANCEL ANYTIME You're in control WHAT ARE YOU WAITING FOR? GET LOOT CRATE We will never share your information.Privacy Policy Want epic deals + the Looter intel? JOIN Epic Geek + Gamer Gear. Loot Crate™ delivers the best in geek + gaming gear. From collectibles, apparel, tech gadgets, art, and other epic gear, it's like Comic-Con in a box! About Blog Our Mission Subscribe How it Works Community Contest Winners LC Magazine Pressroom Careers Affiliates Socialize Facebook Twitter YouTube Instagram Tumblr Support FAQ & Help Center Terms of Service Privacy Policy Contact Copyright © 2016 Loot Crate" (RSpec::Expectations::ExpectationNotMetError)
